item.title: Phylicia Rashad Knows Her Purpose
item.description: Five decades into her career, the Tony Award-winning actress and TV icon, making her Broadway directing debut, feels like “part of something bigger.”

item.title: Mark Carney Calls Snap Elections in Canada Amid Trump Threats
item.description: Mark Carney, who has only been prime minister for 10 days, has called for a general election to be held on April 28.
